author: gail
post: I too bought a copy of the book and can’t wait to read it. I agree that the caustic remarks being hurled here are really childish and uncalled for. Most of the negative comments posted here do sound like someone has a vendetta against John Lupia. Anyway I do really look forward to reading this book and might post after I read it. Gail.
title: The Gibson Study Really Says Nothing About the Shroud of Turin
